page.title: 08WORKING IN A PUB.
page.content: The Cherry Tree has 3 main trade rooms, the public bar and 2 lounge bars.There is a veranda, 1 main cellar and 3 storage rooms for fuel,wine and spirits.They usually start at half nine in the morning cleaning the place and getting it prepared for opening. That usually continues to when they open for lunchtime trading. They then have to be on duty until half past two when the house closes after the lunch time session.After clearing up, they finish about 3 o'clock and they then have the afternoon fairly free although often they have to go to Market Harborough to get bread and various different bits and pieces for use in the pub.At the present time they open at 7 in the evening and go through until eleven when they close. They have got all the rest of the clearing up which is done all week.
